item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "You save yourself or you remain unsaved." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is never too late to be what you might have been." -- George Eliot

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Jane Heller
item.description: "what makes and ordinary person heroic is when they give up the thing they want most" -- Jane Heller

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Jane Green
item.description: "Each of us may think we know exactly what we need to make us happy, what will be good for us, what will ensure we have our happy ending, but life rarely works out in the way we expect, and our happy ending may have all sorts of unexpected twists and turns, be shaped in all sorts of unexpected ways" -- Jane Green

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Joy Fielding
item.description: "We are who we pretend to be." -- Joy Fielding

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "There are no facts, only interpretations." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "Death ends a life, not a relationship." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "Basically, I have two speeds.... Hostile or smart-aleck. Your choice." -- James Patterson

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "All endings are also beginnings. We just don't know it at the time." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Carrie Fisher
item.description: "I don’t want life to imitate art. I want life to BE art." -- Carrie Fisher

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Carrie Fisher
item.description: "Instant gratification takes too long." -- Carrie Fisher

item.title: Alexandra add a quote by Carrie Fisher
item.description: "I rarely cry. I save my feelings up inside me like I have something more specific in mind for them. I am waiting for the exact perfect situationand then BOOM! I'll explode in a light show of feeling and emotion - a pinata stuffed with tender nuances and pent-up passions" -- Carrie Fisher
